title: LADM LA_Source class definition
description: The abstract class to provide support for sources. It has two subclasses: LA_AdministrativeSource and LA_SpatialSource.
$comment: The schema structure is defined in $defs to allow importing into other schemas

sID.description: LADM Oid - The unique identifier of the source

availabilityStatus.description: LA_AvailabilityStatusType - The status of the document availability

submission.description: The date and time of document submission

acceptance.description: The date and time of document acceptance

recordation.description: The date and time of the official recordation

lifeSpanStamp.description: The date and time of the lifecycle in the database

extArchiveID.description: The reference to an external archive (ExtArchive)

quality.description: Data quality elements applicable to this source

source.description: CI_ResponsibleParty - The party responsible for the document (Author/Surveyor)

createdObjects.description: List of VersionedObjects (e.g., Parcels, Rights) created/started by this source event. Can be URI references or full embedded objects.

voidedObjects.description: List of VersionedObjects (e.g., Parcels, Rights) destroyed/ended by this source event. Can be URI references or full embedded objects.
